meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of a sulfide of copper and iron, Cu5FeS4, occurring in copper ores.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a shiny piece of bornite in the copper mine.
meanings.sent2: Miners extracted bornite from the ore to extract copper.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous gnome used bornite to prank his friends by pretending it was gold.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the cave, bouncing off the walls lined with bornite.
meanings.sent5: The bornite sparkled like a hidden treasure in the dimly lit mine shaft.
